lenders.name: WCE-INDIA
lenders.occupational_info:
Energy efficiency and clean, renewable energy will mean a stronger economy, a cleaner environment, and greater energy independence for any country. By investing in technology breakthroughs today, our nation can look forward to a more resilient economy and secure future. Far-reaching technology changes will be essential to India's energy future. Working with a wide array of state, community, industry, and grass root NGO partners, the WCE INDIA through Solar Energy For All (SEFA) project invests in a portfolio of energy technologies that will:

Conserve energy in the residential, commercial, industrial, government, and transportation sectors.
Increase and diversify energy supply, with a focus on renewable domestic sources.
Facilitate the emergence of solar technologies as vital new "energy carriers."
Upgrade India’s national energy infrastructure.

The Project aims to convert all existing electric power backup & hot water systems to solar power systems (electric, fuel or gas boosted) within 10 years and ensure all installations from 2010 are solar power & hot water systems. This is an ambitious goal and will require the commitment of several parties to achieve large-scale community behavioral change. The potential benefits facilitated by the Project are compelling and are detailed within the body of this report. The Project is unashamedly focused upon INDIA and has been designed to enable it to be replicated with other “green” products.

lenders.name: FIU Microlenders
lenders.loan_because:
The FIU Micro Lenders, a new student organizing committee at Florida International University, as well as a non-profit 501c3 Florida corporation is committed to helping fight global poverty. Via mutually beneficial partnerships with local businesses, fund-raising efforts, and encouraging microfinance education for FIU's students they seek to provide tools for everyone to make their own contribution to a better world. 

We will continue to forge partnerships within our community, raise awareness of the powerful force of microfinance, and redefine what it means to be an International Business student.

For more information or to join your energies to our fight, please email us at:

fiumicrolenders@gmail.com
Second Kiva page at:
www.kiva.org/lender/fiumicrolenderscorp
lenders.occupational_info: We are International Business students enrolled at Florida International University.

lenders.loan_because: it gives individuals the one thing that is needed in order to empower themselves, self-actualize, and take control of their lives: hope.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: I can help others achieve their dreams - or at least short and mid term goals.  The internet brought us all closer together and I feel happy to be able to help.  I can hear the business owner’s story and plan, watch the progress, and hopefully celebrate in their success.  Compared to my life of work, TV, eat, and sleep - I can, in a small way, participate with someone and their family doing something truly worthwhile and amazing.
lenders.occupational_info: My job is difficult to describe. I listen, analyze, and talk about problems to other people that listen, analyze, and talk.  I sit in front of a computer and work long hours but do not create anything real.  I stare at information moving across my screen and try to identify problems - its like watching thousands of people getting on and off a train and trying to pick out two people wearing the same shoes

lenders.name: Robin

lenders.name: kamal
lenders.loan_because: i start my business from zero .  my family is not so rich.  they unable to help me.  so i borrow money from my friend.  he apply heavy interst on this amount.  now these days i pay most of money as a interst.  this effect my business so much.  if i get this loan i get rid from this heavy interst.  for pay back i'm able to pay 5000/- Rs. per month if i get 100000 Rs.
lenders.occupational_info: google

lenders.name: Anonymous
lenders.loan_because:
1. Titus 2:11-12
For the grace of God that brings salvation has appeared to all men.  It teaches us to say 'No' to ungodliness and worldly passions, and to live self-controlled, upright and Godly lives in this present age, while we wait for the blessed hope - the glorious appearing of our great God and Savior, Jesus Christ,

2. Titus 3:7-8 
So that, having been justified by his grace, we might become heirs having the hope of eternal life.  This is a trustworthy saying.  And I want you to stress these things, so that those who have trusted in God may be careful to devote themselves to doing what is good.  These things are excellent and profitable for everyone.

3. Someone believed in me and now it's my turn to believe in someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: Day job provides capital for a small business, which then creates tax savings and capital for another business, which further provides capital for stock market and property investments.

lenders.name: The Personal MBA
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is a way of showing how business can change lives for the better.
lenders.occupational_info:
The Personal MBA is a project dedicated to helping its members educate themselves about business.  The core of the Personal MBA is a list of the best business books currently available, which members can use to get a world-class business education quickly and inexpensively.

Premium Personal MBA services include members-only forums, special events, personalized learning plan development, and professional coaching.

lenders.occupational_info: I work mainly in marketing, my tittle of project manager (traffic manager in most places) ones act a liason with the copy writer, art director, production, studio to make something happen..this something can be an ad, or a direct mail piece, point of purchase...which ever it is, I help manage these components so they can come together within an specific timeline...time is very sensitive in this industry, especially if your client has bought media space, this  being newspaper, magazine, billboard etc.

lenders.name: Michiel
lenders.loan_because: Lending trough Kiva offers a great way of helping those who need it most in a way that I feel definitely works. It's not just transferring money to a bank account but you're making a true investment that pays off in many ways.

lenders.name: George
lenders.loan_because: I have some extra money and I would like to support other people with it.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach chemistry at the University of Rhode Island. I used to keep records of cancer cases in Detroit, Michigan to help doctors and researchers who treat and study cancer.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: "Give a man a fish; you have fed him for today.  Teach a man to fish; and you have fed him for a lifetime." The next step after teaching is to equip him to fish.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach adults.

lenders.name: Rene
lenders.loan_because: I believe there is more than one way to save the world...
lenders.occupational_info: I investigate and keep track of infectious diseases, making sure they are under control and do not affect too many people too fast.

lenders.name: Theodore
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the ability of people throughout the world to create a better life for themselves and their families with just a little help from those who have a bit more of this world goods.
lenders.occupational_info: I do clinical research in the areas of substance use disorder and violence.

lenders.name: Scot
lenders.loan_because: The aim of life is to live, and to live means to be aware...joyously, drunkenly, serenely, divinely aware.

lenders.name: Darren
lenders.loan_because: It makes a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies to become profitable.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because:
I started my business over 30 years ago with $1200, a credit card and the encouragement of a mentor.  I had to be in profit enough to live on my earnings the first month. While I am not wealthy, I have enough....and so much more than many others.  I learned about microeconomic loans years ago and fell in love with the idea....especially since many such loans help women gain greater autonomy and confidence from running their own businesses. This is a tangible way that I can honor those who helped me by helping others....
May our lendees enjoy the rewards (and struggles) of small business ownership and may people reaching out to people in some way bring more 'heart' back into a world that has become increasingly dominated by large corporations. I have traveled a fair amount in other parts of the world and we humans seem to have the same hopes, fears, dreams, loves and heartbreaks the world over.  It is the love and spirit that I can still see in the eyes and feel in the hearts of "poor" people in so-called Third World countries that renews my soul and reminds me what is really important.
lenders.occupational_info: Mostly I rub the kinks and knots in people's tight neck, back and shoulder muscles and listen to an endless stream of the little (usually VERY little) and big  problems of my clients.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: Giving to those who are working hard is right. They need it, and deserve it. God bless!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student. I'm currently studying and working to be an entrepreneur myself.

lenders.name: Ann & Bill
lenders.loan_because: We recognize that, as a family, we've been blessed. Doing this little bit to help hardworking people help themselves seems the least we can do.
lenders.occupational_info: Ann is perpetually busy taking care of our home and 2 daughters. Bill is an Obstetrician/Gynecologist - involved in women's health care.

lenders.name: Anna&Olly
lenders.loan_because: it seemed like a good idea at the time.
lenders.occupational_info:
Olly is almost 8 years old and is in Year 3 at school. He likes NZ native birds, Minecraft and Doctor Who.
Anna is a bit older. She works as an Infrastructure resource consent planner. She likes reading books and hanging out with Olly.

lenders.name: Sky
lenders.occupation: Certified Massage Therapist and Life Coach
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back
lenders.occupational_info: I help people through transitions, which can be anything from career to relationship. I love working with women entrepreneurs, help find what it is they truly desire and help them focus on their goal. And I am also a bodyworker and energy healer.

lenders.name: Danny & Veronica
lenders.loan_because: Even though we are not rich, we feel it is important to help those less fortunate, so we want to help those who want to help themselves.

lenders.name: Adrian
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because:
it helps people and it makes
me feel happy.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work at a university designing
and managing construction projects.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with children of different abilities.

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.loan_because: Everybody deserves an opportunity
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying business and international affairs

lenders.name: Diana
lenders.loan_because: I would like to use the money in five years to adopt a girl from china but right now the money can help someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I take classes, tutor, and teach.

lenders.name: Corlett Family
lenders.loan_because: this is a great idea and we like to help others!
lenders.occupational_info: I add my voice to animated cartoons, radio & TV shows and commercials.  I also write and create childrens TV shows.

lenders.name: Douglas Hooper
lenders.loan_because: A man's home is where he prospers. Let us build prosperity together!

lenders.name: Keith
lenders.loan_because: I am a Christian.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell airplane parts to airlines.

lenders.name: Richy Li
lenders.loan_because: Helping others around the world is good. I have been helping others by different ways, volunteering, donating or teaching, but lending as a social investor is very new to me.
lenders.occupational_info: Creative fundraising with internet

lenders.name: Karan
lenders.loan_because: I like the concept of a 'loan'. I think it allows people to get help they need without losing their self respect in the process.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage teams that write computer programs to help run businesses more efficiently.

lenders.name: Bobby
lenders.loan_because: Because I can.... after many years of hard work I have established myself as a working professional. It took a a helping hand to reach my goals and now I am grateful that I can help someone else reach theirs.
lenders.occupational_info: Map Maker

lenders.name: Sandy
lenders.occupational_info: hella stressful!

lenders.name: Mariel
lenders.loan_because: I love the feeling of being able to help someone with their business, preserve their pride, and exercise great financial responsibility. I applaud all the small business owners all over the world who strive to make honest, successful livelihoods.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a college student at the Haas School of Business at UC Berkeley studying Business Management.

lenders.name: Pedro
lenders.loan_because:
On my trips to other countries I have always been welcomed warm-heartedly.
Lending money to local start-ups is just a little effort for us in the "developed countries", but it can change a life for the beneficiary of the loan and their families.

lenders.name: matt and gail
lenders.loan_because: We can and we should...

lenders.name: Monsur
lenders.loan_because: it could make someone capable to help others in turn.

lenders.name: Vanessa
lenders.loan_because: To help people to achieve thier dream.
lenders.occupational_info: Love to cook for other people, and some day hope to have my own restaurant or teach other people to cook.

lenders.name: mohammad reza
lenders.loan_because: i am going to set up a business in russia and need almost 5000 usd -10000 usd loan amount to begin.
lenders.occupational_info:
i am a business consultant and an
expert  of forex and wish to set up a forex company in moscow.

lenders.name: NELLO
lenders.loan_because: To provide opportunities to those that less fortunate, but honest and hardworking people.
lenders.occupational_info: I am course manager for the US Army Aviaion maintenance training.

lenders.name: Turner Family
lenders.loan_because: Teaching our 15 year old the importance of being a positive influence in a very small world

lenders.name: lori
lenders.loan_because: To give back to the wonderful people of Mexico

lenders.name: Bruce and Ruth
lenders.loan_because: Others have given us a helping hand, so we offer one in return.
lenders.occupational_info: I recommend solutions to allow disabled farmers to continue farming.

lenders.name: Cheri
lenders.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to be able to do it.

lenders.name: Terrence
lenders.loan_because: It is a way of helping someone who you know by name.  Lending builds capacity in others rather than just sustaining them.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Todd
lenders.loan_because: People who work hard and have plans to better their family's life, deserve the communal capital to help them achieve their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people learn how to do three things.  First, observe relations between individuals, groups, and organizations.  Second, how to explain what they find.  Third, how to use that learning to actively improve their world.

lenders.name: Eric & Vivian
lenders.loan_because: We're very blessed to be in the position that we're in and there are many who are not as fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: Software Engineering consultant and international flight attendant.

lenders.name: Pierre
lenders.loan_because: I think it is an efficient way to help people out.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people to improve their business.

lenders.name: Hunter & Teresa
lenders.loan_because: we want to help give others an opportunity to succeed.

lenders.name: R & K
lenders.loan_because: We know that such a small outreach can make a huge difference.

lenders.name: Rose
lenders.loan_because: it connects me to the world
lenders.occupational_info: banking operations

lenders.name: Nathan
lenders.occupation: Grad Student and Real Estate Agent
lenders.loan_because:
John 13: 34-35

Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
-Theodore Roosevelt

lenders.name: Ina
lenders.loan_because: Because I can. It makes me connected. Thank you Kiva for making this possible.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: "Globalization" is not just about multinational corporations.  It's about recognizing that what happens in Africa affects those of us in the US and in all the developed countries.  I was lucky enough to end up in a good family in the wealthiest nation in the world.  The true entrepreneurs are those that Kiva supports.
lenders.occupational_info: One of the great things about the U.S. is our civil justice system.  When someone is hurt at the expense of a big company that individual can walk into a court house and know that she is going to get a fair trial.  I represent people who are taking on those big companies.  I like to think that part of the reason that they can get a fair trial is that there are trial lawyers in this country who are ready, willing and able to stand in a court and fight for justice, no matter how much money someone has.
